objectives_summary: Understand the Concept of Money Laundering
Comprehend the AML Framework
Identify the Red Flags of Money Laundering

items.title: 1. Principles of Simple Interest

visible_instructors.title: Helen Dakin
visible_instructors.name: Helen

items.headline: In this course I will introduce you to the basic simple interest formulas and how to solve problems with them.
objectives_summary: solve for the future value or maturity value
Solve for the interest amount
solve for the rate
